author: Mike Stumbo
description: Enhanced asset management with tagging, collections, and dependency tracking
new_features: Asset Tagging System: Custom labels for improved organization
Asset Collections: Group related assets into collections
Dependency Tracking: Track asset relationships and dependencies
Batch Operations: Import/export multiple assets at once
Asset Versioning: Track and manage asset versions
Enhanced Context Menus: Right-click asset management
Advanced Filtering: Filter by tags, collections, and more
Management Dialogs: Dedicated windows for collections and dependencies

changes: Added asset tagging system with custom labels
Implemented asset collections and sets functionality
Added dependency tracking and viewer system
Added asset versioning with notes and history
Enhanced context menus with right-click operations
Added advanced filtering by tags and collections
Improved UI layout with left panel for organization
